channel.title: Pwnscape 317/377 BH and duping
channel.description:
Firstly I'm looking for a solution to fix trade duping. I have tried multiple methods with no sucess so far. Has anyone managed to fix it on a pwnscape base and could you post the code you used please?
Secondly I am looking at adding a BH minigame where you can pk without losing items and random drops are generated. Is this possible on a 317/377?
Thanks.

I think so yes.
